title: SC rejects Adani firm's plea for over Rs 1300 crore as late payment surcharge from Rajasthan state discom
description: The Supreme Court has dismissed Adani Power Rajasthan Ltd's plea for over Rs 1,300 crore as late payment surcharge from Jaipur Vidyut Vitran Nigam Limited, ruling that filing a miscellaneous application was not the proper legal recourse.
